snippet: ELLSWEIG--Barbara Mendler, November 24, 1932 to May 7, 2016. Survived by Robert Ellsweig, loving husband of 65 years, children Daniel, Debra and Lisa, grandchildren Andrew, Jessica, Julee, and Katherine, great-grandchildren River and Alice. You will be forever in our hearts. All services were held privately under the care of Martin Funeral Home, Clinton NJ . www.martinfh.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ELLSWEIG, BARBARA MENDLER
